Instances.input: I've visited several dispensaries recently and I agree, they're long on schwag and short on knowledge. One answer is to secure a good grower. They're out there. Oddly, many folks think growers are dripping with money. Perhaps some are but most growers are barely making it pay. I grow medical grade, sun grown cannabis for my own use and for two others who are quite ill and physically unable to participate. We produce one crop annually that fills the jars for the coming year. My patients contribute financially to offset the fixed costs of stock acquisition, soil, amendments, propagation, water, labor, drying, curing, weighing, etc.  It's production farming so I recommend getting as close to the source as possible and avoid the dispensary blues.
